name: 3dMatch
author: AFNI Team
description: Find similar subbricks and rearrange order to ease comparison. Part of FATCAT in AFNI.

inputs.description: File with M subbricks of data to match against another file.
inputs.name: Input file to match

inputs.description: File with N subbricks, serving as a reference for INPUT_FILE.
inputs.name: Reference file

inputs.description: A mask of regions to include in the correlation of datasets.
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: Threshold below which values in INPUT_FILE will be zeroed during analysis.
inputs.name: Input minimum threshold

inputs.description: Threshold above which values in INPUT_FILE will be zeroed during analysis.
inputs.name: Input maximum threshold

inputs.description: Threshold below which values in REF_FILE will be zeroed during analysis.
inputs.name: Reference minimum threshold

inputs.description: Threshold above which values in REF_FILE will be zeroed during analysis.
inputs.name: Reference maximum threshold

inputs.description: Prefix for output name for BRIK/HEAD files and *_coeff.vals text files.
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Apply thresholding only during Dice evaluation, not during spatial correlation.
inputs.name: Only Dice threshold flag

output-files.description: AFNI BRIK file with the same number of subbricks as the refset file, with highest weighted correlation.
output-files.name: Output REF BRIK file

output-files.description: Text file recording original indices and coefficients.
output-files.name: Output REF coefficients file

output-files.description: AFNI BRIK file with the same number of subbricks as the inset file, with highest weighted correlation.
output-files.name: Output IN BRIK file

output-files.description: Text file recording original indices and coefficients.
output-files.name: Output IN coefficients file
